activities: AudiencePoint provides send time optimization personalization for email recipients so they will receive emails when they are most likely online. AudiencePoint import open and click history from the ESP ( ExactTarget ) When imported each subscriber is assigned a unique id, which we use to track through the whole system.  The open and click history is then used to analyze when each subscriber is most likely to interact.
personaldata: AudiencePoint collects personally identifiable information, such as your e-mail address, name, home or work address or telephone number. AudiencePoint also collects anonymous demographic information, which is not unique to you, such as your ZIP code, age, gender, preferences, interests and favorites.
